sentences.english: This year sees the tercentenary of Handel's birth.
sentences.chinese: 今年是韩德尔诞辰叁百周年。

sentences.english: The Messiah Oratorio was composed by George Frideric Handel in 1741.
sentences.chinese: 神剧由韩德尔在1741年创作而成。
